verses.name: Job 5:6
verses.text: Although affliction cometh not forth of the dust, neither doth trouble spring out of the ground;

verses.name: Job 5:7
verses.text: Yet man is born unto trouble, as the sparks fly upward.

verses.name: Job 5:8
verses.text: I would seek unto God, and unto God would I commit my cause:

verses.name: Job 5:9
verses.text: Which doeth great things and unsearchable; marvellous things without number:

verses.name: Job 5:10
verses.text: Who giveth rain upon the earth, and sendeth waters upon the fields:

verses.name: Job 5:11
verses.text: To set up on high those that be low; that those which mourn may be exalted to safety.

verses.name: Job 5:12
verses.text: He disappointeth the devices of the crafty, so that their hands cannot perform their enterprise.
